titles.title: Lift Up Your Heads, Ye Mighty Gates

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: O blest the land, the city blest, Where Christ the ruler is confest! O happy hearts and happy homes To whom this King of triumph comes!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Fling wide the portals of your heart; Make it a temple, set apart From earthly use for heav’n’s employ, Adorned with prayer and love and joy.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Redeemer, come! We open wide Our hearts to thee, Lord, abide! Let our Thy inner presence feel; Thy grace and love in us reveal.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: So come, our Sovereign, enter in! Let new and nobler life begin; Thy Holy Spirit guide us on, Until the glorious crown be won.
